# Project: Immersive Storytelling Experience

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router, TypeScript)
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion (animations)
- Three.js + @react-three/fiber (3D effects)
- Howler.js (ambient audio)
- Firebase (Auth + Firestore)

## Project Structure
- `/` - Portal entrance (two doors choice)
- `/write` - Digital campfire writing interface
- `/transform` - Transformation chamber animation
- `/reveal` - Before/After revelation view
- `/garden` - Personal growth garden
- `/constellation` - Shared story galaxy

## Design Philosophy
- No boring websites - create magic at every interaction
- Breathing layouts, particle effects, emotional weather
- Progressive disclosure, gamification elements
- Ultimate safety and comfort in every pixel
